DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine if the SNAP II electroencephalography (EEG) monitor accurately reflects changes in sedation level in outpatients undergoing surgery or procedures with sedation.
DOC.brief_title: Use of the SNAP II Electroencephalography (EEG) Monitor in Outpatients Undergoing Surgery/Procedures With Sedation
DOC.criteria: American Society of Anesthesiologists (ASA) I, II or III physical status Use of inhalation general anesthesia ASA IV physical status
DOC.keyword: patients having outpatient surgery with sedation
